FuncDef:
The frame-format command configures the frame format of an E1 interface.
The undo frame-format command restores the default setting.
This command varies in transport and router modes. For detailed differences, see Differences Between Commands in Transport and Router Modes. This topic describes the command configuration in router mode.
By default, the frame format of an E1 interface is no-CRC4.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the frame format as CRC4.
-

Specifies the frame format as no-CRC4.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The frame format can be configured for an E1 interface only when the E1 interface works in CE1 mode.
When configuring the frame format of an E1 interface, ensure that the local and remote ends are configured with the same frame format.
